docs.text: Fixed gear buying guide hi! This guide is heavily inspired (or downright copied from the users' suggestions) by the r/fixedgearbicycle subreddit. The subreddit's guides are becoming stale/old, and this guide is a effort to build something more updatable and reliable that enables everyone to contribute. The aim is to provide an easy to access guide with bikes sorted by region and price range. Contributing You can contribute via: pull requests if you know how they work opening an issue and letting someone who knows to do a pull request Google Sheets (note that someone will need to update the website

Fuji Feather Feathers are renewed each year with only new colors/colorschemes: try to get a last years' one as it will be the same but cheaper.
